bill.title: Requirements for Sale of Firearms Ammunition
bill.description: Concerning requirements for the retail sale of ammunition for firearms, and, in connection therewith, establishing requirements for the delivery of ammunition sold at retail.

history.action: Introduced In House - Assigned to Business Affairs & Labor
House Committee on Business Affairs & Labor Refer Amended to House Committee of the Whole
House Second Reading Laid Over Daily - No Amendments
House Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments - Committee, Floor
House Third Reading Laid Over Daily - No Amendments
House Third Reading Passed with Amendments - Floor
Introduced In Senate - Assigned to State, Veterans, & Military Affairs
Senate Committee on State, Veterans, & Military Affairs Refer Amended to Senate Committee of the Whole
Senate Second Reading Laid Over to 03/24/2025 - No Amendments
Senate Second Reading Passed with Amendments - Committee, Floor
Senate Third Reading Passed - No Amendments
House Considered Senate Amendments - Result was to Laid Over Daily
House Considered Senate Amendments - Result was to Concur - Repass
Signed by the Speaker of the House
Signed by the President of the Senate
